original_text: Then he said to all the people, ‘Be very careful! Do not want more things than you really need. A person's life is worth more than the things that he has, even if he is very rich.’
korean_text: 그들에게 이르시되 삼가 모든 탐심을 물리치라 사람의 생명이 그 소유의 넉넉한 데 있지 아니하니라 하시고

sentences.original_text: Then he said to all the people
Do not want more things than you really need
sentences.korean_translation: 정말 필요한 것보다 더 많은 것을 원하지 말라

sentences.original_text: A person's life is worth more than the things that he has
sentences.korean_translation: 한 사람의 생명은 그가 가진 것들보다 더 가치가 있다

sentences.original_text: even if he is very rich
